sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import Code from '../components/code' export default ({components, ...props}) => {`Build the Next and Favorite UI`} {`Install `}{`react-icons`} {`First thing we will need to do is install `}{`react-icons`}{` and on CodeSandbox you do that by clicking on `}{`Add Dependency`}{`, look for `}{`react-icons`}{`, click on it and CodeSandbox will automatically install it in your project.`} {`After that we want for now two icons: `}{`GoHeart`}{` and `}{`GoArrowRight`}{` and we want to import it from `}{`/go`}{` for the github icons so we write:`} {`Add the boilerplate JSX`} {`After these has been added we can now add our JSX to show our buttons even if they don't do anything so after the `}{`
